title: Golden Bay
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, Stanhope Andrews and Cecil Holmes
brief_description: A social study of the occupations, leisure activities, community life and local government of the people of Takaka (South Island, New Zealand) and its surrounding district, Golden Bay. Farming is the main business of the people but the area is linked historically with Abel Tasman’s discovery of New Zealand.
